author: Staff Reporter
text: Owners of power loom job working units, who are on an indefinite strike since January 28, have threatened to go on fasting from next week if the issues were not resolved quickly. They had been on strike alleging that the textile unit owners, with whom they signed an agreement fixing job work charge slabs for production of fabrics, were not disbursing the job work charges at the revised rates.
title: Power loom job working units threaten to go on strike
